name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Henry J. WILLIAMSON, a/k/a Harry Williamson, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Henry J. WILLIAMSON, a/k/a Harry Williamson, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Edward J. Hughes, Norristown, for appellant.
Mary M. Killinger, Chief, Appeals, Fort Washington, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
523 A.2d 333
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Henry J. WILLIAMSON, a/k/a Harry Williamson, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 23, 1986.
Decided March 30, 1987.
Edward J. Hughes, Norristown, for appellant.
Mary M. Killinger, Chief, Appeals, Fort Washington, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
